rows.label: tlk001101_01_msg0001
rows.name: This is truly a magnificent place!

rows.label: tlk001101_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I was fortunate to have the chance to
talk to some of the residents earlier.
They are truly hospitable people!

rows.label: tlk001101_01_msg0003
rows.name: And it is so calm and peaceful...

rows.label: tlk001101_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I will soon retire for the night.
Please, Master Rex, take the
opportunity to relax a little.
